p: Cellulose nanofibers and nanocrystals surface-modified by rosin can be prepared according to Scheme 76, prior to washing in ethanol [ 259, 260]. They can be used as antibacterial reinforcements in bio-based package films [ 260]. In similar way hemp fibers can be modified by tall oil rosin acids in order to improve the reinforcement adhesion to an epoxy matrix [ 261].
